lead_paragraph: Another reason to be concerned about the sustainability of consumer spending growth: Consumer spending eked upward in September (rising 0.2 percent), but incomes fell slightly (down 0.1 percent). Consumers were able to spend more only because they decided to salt away less of their paychecks, reducing their savings rates.
snippet: Another reason to be concerned about the sustainability of consumer spending growth.

headline.main: Consumer Spending Up as Incomes Fall

abstract: Another reason to be concerned about the sustainability of consumer spending growth.
